meanings.definition: A type or kind of people or things.
meanings.sent1: She preferred to socialize with the ilks who shared her love for art.
meanings.sent2: In the library, you can find books of all ilks, from mysteries to biographies.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the ilks of superheroes and princesses mingled together.
meanings.sent4: The ilks of flowers in the garden danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The ilks of birds chirped harmoniously in the early morning.

meanings.definition: People or things of a similar type or kind.
meanings.sent1: The market was bustling with vendors selling ilks of handmade crafts.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed spending time with ilks who shared her passion for hiking.
meanings.sent3: The ilks of ice cream flavors in the shop tempted her taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The ilks of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly above.
meanings.sent5: The ilks of cars zoomed past on the busy highway.
